channel.title: Wierd Error Please look ASAP
channel.description:
I added Highscores and now im getting this error (508 by the way)
[code]The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
The .bat contains.
[code]@echo off color 0a cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar Server pause[/code]

item.title: Wierd Error Please look ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Looks like you have either not got a server class file or you used Upper case letters when your file is actaully called ‘server.java’ in lowercase.

Read full topic

item.title: Wierd Error Please look ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Pureman0194 Pureman0194
item.description:
@Pureman0194 wrote:

I added Highscores and now im getting this error (508 by the way)

The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

The .bat contains.

@echo off color 0a cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar Server pause
